data.title: Rahul Mahajan Is Getting Divorced From His Third Wife, Natalya Ilina? He Shares, 'I'm Doing Well'
data.meta_description: As per reports, Rahul Mahajan is separating from his third wife, Natalya Ilina, who is a Kazakhstan model by profession. In addition, the actor also addressed
data.text:
Popular television actor, Rahul Mahajan often hits the headlines for his personal life. Once again, rumours of his divorce from his third wife, Natalya Ilina surfaced on the internet. For the unversed, Rahul tied the knot for the third time with a Kazakhstan model, Natalya on November 20, 2018, in an intimate affair in Mumbai, with the presence of only a few close friends and family members in attendance. Since then, the adorable couple has been enjoying the best of their married lives. Now, reports suggest that Rahul has parted ways with Natalya after being in marital bliss for four years.

advertisement

Rahul Mahajan gets divorced from his thrid-wife, Natalya Ilina?

As per a report in the ETimes, a source close to the couple, Rahul Mahajan, and his third wife, Natalya Ilina revealed that the duo has filed for divorce due to compatibility issues in 2022. However, it is unclear whether their divorce has been finalised. The source also mentioned that Rahul is completely shattered by the same and said:

"Compatibility issues were there between the two since the beginning. However, they stretched their marriage as long as they could. They parted ways last year and have filed for divorce. He was absolutely shattered after the break up. Now he is doing fine. He is getting back to life. He was not in a great state the last year. Now, he is hoping to find love. He has also decided to not talk about his personal life due to his past experiences."

Suggested Read: Kajol Reveals How Shah Rukh Khan Got A Frozen Shoulder While Shooting DDLJ, 'Mujhe Itna Bura Laga'

advertisement

advertisement

Rahul Mahajan and Natalya Ilina's reaction to their divorce rumours

Recently, in a short conversation with the ETimes, Rahul was asked about the divorce rumours with his wife, Natalya. To this, he mentioned, "I want to keep my private life private. I would not like to comment on anything. I do not discuss what's happening in my personal life even with my friends." However, he also added, "By the way, I'm doing well." On the other hand, Natalya preferred to keep shut about the same.

advertisement

For the unversed, Rahul Mahajan was earlier married to Shweta Singh, after knowing her for 13 years. But Rahul and Shweta parted ways in 2008. Two years later, in 2010, he exchanged wedding vows with Dimpy Ganguly on a television show, Swayamvar. However, things went topsy turvy in Rahul and Dimpy's marriage, and she filed a case against him in 2014 for physically abusing her. After his divorce from Dimpy, Rahul entered the marital journey for the third time with his current wife, Natalya IIina in 2018.

advertisement

Recommended Read: Dipika Kakar Shares Adorable Glimpse Of Husband, Shoaib Playing With Their Son, Pens 'Mera Sukoon'

advertisement.

When Rahul and Natalya talked about their companionship

In 2022, Rahul Mahajan and his estranged wife, Natalya Ilina participated in the reality show, Smart Jodi. In one of the show's episodes, Natalya was heard saying that Rahul's marriage with Shweta Singh and Dimpy Ganguly, doesn't matter to her as it was a short-term relationship. Natalya also mentioned that marriage holds a special meaning to her. In the same episode, Rahul added to his wife's thoughts and said that if he had to marry for the fourth time, then that would also be with Natalya. In another interview with the Bombay Times, Rahul had talked about his experience with his previous two partners, Shweta Singh and Dimpy Ganguly. He also mentioned that they were not compatible, and his then-current wife, Natalya, and he have discovered new companionship.

advertisement

advertisement
